prompts: Create a colorful bird Pokemon that has striking red and green feathers.
I want a design for a flying-type Pokemon with unique wing patterns and a vibrant color palette.
Generate an elegant Pokemon with a long neck and distinct facial features inspired by birds.
Make a majestic Pokemon that embodies the spirit of freedom and grace in the sky.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, showcasing its intelligence and adaptability.
Design a Pokemon that is both fierce and beautiful, with a unique color scheme and personality.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elegance and strength, perfect for aerial battles and competitions.
